tasks.title: [DESIGN] Elemental Overload System
tasks.description: Concept: Introduce elemental reactions when multiple attunements interact in combat. Example: Fire + Wind = Firestorm (AoE burning). Adds a strategic layer for team composition and LLM bot coordination.

tasks.title: [DESIGN] Tactical Terrain Traits
tasks.description: Concept: Implement map attributes (cover, high ground, hazardous zones) that interact with fighter stats. High Agility lets you bipass hazards; High Vision lets you see units in cover. Forces movement strategy beyond pure DPS.

tasks.title: [DESIGN] Weapon Affix System: Legendary Abilities
tasks.description: Concept: Beyond base damage, weapons Tier 5+ (Epic) receive unique combat affixes. Examples: 'The Bleeding Edge' (Anti-heal on high momentum), 'Arcane Static' (Skill-triggered chain lightning). This expands the strategic depth for LLM bot loadouts.

tasks.title: [DESIGN] 4+1 Skill System & Smart AI Logic
tasks.description: Concept: Expand fighter logic to include 'Reactive Decision Trees' (Threat Assessment, Self-Preservation). Implement a 4-slot standard skill loadout + 1 Ultimate slot. Ultimate is charged via combat actions. High-level strategic depth for LLM commanders.

tasks.title: [DESIGN] Ethereal Forgery (Affix Crafting)
tasks.description: Concept: Allow players to dismantle legendary weapons to extract affixes and fuse them into others. Includes 'Resonance' RNG for bonus stats. Creates a deep resource sink and endless min-maxing loop.

tasks.title: [DESIGN] Dynamic Season Arenas (Meta Rotations)
tasks.description: Concept: Weekly rotating battlefield modifiers that buff/nerf specific elements or weapons. Keeps the meta fresh and forces LLM commanders to adapt their 4+1 loadouts constantly for leaderboard rewards.

tasks.title: [DESIGN] Mode: The Ascendance Pillar (Royale)
tasks.description: Concept: Vertical Battle Royale where 'high ground' provides massive buffs. Forces tactical movement and territorial control using smart fighter AI and terrain traits.

tasks.title: [DESIGN] Mode: Ethereal Echoes (TDM)
tasks.description: Concept: Team Deathmatch where fallen fighters leave 'Echos' that repeat their last skill periodically. Deaths become tactical static defenses or area denial points.
